short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension turns the website into a Mickey Danka advertisement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension swappes some images and texts on a website to content related to Mickey Danka as a fun example of a chrome extension and to show our love for him.
